Texts.Eng:
Insectoid bee-people.

Diet: Herbavore, prefers sugary items.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
+^green;15^reset;% Health, ^green;-20^reset;% Fall Damage, +^green;10^reset;% Speed
+^green;50^reset;% Poison Resist
Immune: Bee Stings, Honey
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
Increased air agility, poor movement in liquid
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Sniper Rifles / Machine Pistols: +^green;15^reset;% Damage
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
-^red;50^reset;% Fire resist, -^red;30^reset;% Ice resist
